name: KingFrogs: Frozen Lake
description:
Lead your frog to crown before others, spawning lily pads and ice to misguide enemy frogs. 16 puzzling levels in Swamp and Frozen Lake. Game built with Dijstra's algorithm

ActionControlsStart levelenter/spaceMove cursor
wasd/arrowsSpawn lilies1, 2, 3Restart levelrExit to menuesc

Check out second creator on Twitter and VK

All sounds are from freesound.org
